br.uff.midiacom.ana.link
Class NCLLink<L extends NCLLink,P extends NCLParam,B extends NCLBind,C extends NCLCausalConnector>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLIdentifiableElement
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.link.NCLLink<L,P,B,C>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Element, IdentifiableElement, java.lang.Comparable<L>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLLink<L extends NCLLink,P extends NCLParam,B extends NCLBind,C extends NCLCausalConnector>
extends NCLIdentifiableElement
implements java.lang.Comparable<L>

Esta classe define o elemento link da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define um elo de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
